per_frame_1=q1 = 0.0003*(pow(1+1.2*bass+0.4*bass_att+0.1*treb+0.1*treb_att+0.1*mid+0.1*mid_att,6));
per_frame_2=monitor = q1;
per_frame_3=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*sin(time*0.565);
per_frame_4=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*sin(time*0.615);
per_frame_5=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*sin(time*0.665);
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom + 0.025;
per_pixel_2=//rot = rot + 0.05*sin(fps*100)*q1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw;
warp_4=`    float3 dx = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - 2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) )*0.5;
warp_5=`    float3 dy = ( 2*GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - 2*GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) )*0.5;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 1.2 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`    float2 my_uv =  lerp(uv_orig,uv,1) ;
warp_10=`    float2 uv_x= frac(my_uv + float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw  *4);
warp_11=`    float2 uv_y= frac(my_uv + float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw  *4);
warp_12=`    float2 uv_z= frac(my_uv + float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw  *4);
warp_13=`    ret.x = GetPixel(uv_x).x - (2*GetPixel(uv_x) - 2*GetBlur3(uv_x)).x  * 0.01;
warp_14=`    ret.y = GetPixel(uv_y).y - (2*GetPixel(uv_y) - 2*GetBlur3(uv_y)).y  * 0.01;
warp_15=`    ret.z = GetPixel(uv_z).z - (2*GetPixel(uv_z) - 2*GetBlur3(uv_z)).z  * 0.01;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5) *0.008;
warp_18=`ret -= ret.yzx*0.1 - 0.014;
warp_19=`
warp_20=`}
